trans-unit.source: Represents the control that displays a header that has a collapsible window that displays content.
trans-unit.target: Representa o controle que exibe um cabeçalho que tem uma janela recolhível que exibe o conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: Expander is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl>, which means its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> properties can be of any type (such as string, image, or panel).
trans-unit.target: Expansor é um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl>, que significa que seu <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A>Propriedades podem ser de qualquer tipo (como cadeia de caracteres, imagem ou painel).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows an Expander control.
trans-unit.target: A ilustração a seguir mostra um controle Expander.

trans-unit.source: ![Expander example](~/add/media/expanderexample.JPG "Expander example") If the content of the expanded window is too large for the window, you can wrap the content of the Expander in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control to provide scrollable content.
trans-unit.target: ![Exemplo de expansor](~/add/media/expanderexample.JPG "exemplo expansor") se o conteúdo da janela expandida é muito grande para a janela, você pode encapsular o conteúdo do expansor em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>controle para fornecer conteúdo rolável.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: Scrolling capability is not automatically provided by the Expander control.
trans-unit.target: Não é fornecido automaticamente ao recurso de rolagem pelo controle expansor.

trans-unit.source: For an Expander to work correctly, do not specify a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> on the Expander control when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.ExpandDirection%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExpandDirection> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExpandDirection>.
trans-unit.target: Para um expansor funcione corretamente, não especifique um <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>no expansor controlar quando a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.ExpandDirection%2A>propriedade é definida como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExpandDirection>ou <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExpandDirection>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExpandDirection> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExpandDirection> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.ExpandDirection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, do not specify a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A> on the Expander control when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.ExpandDirection%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExpandDirection> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExpandDirection>.
trans-unit.target: Da mesma forma, não especifique um <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>no expansor controlar quando a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.ExpandDirection%2A>propriedade é definida como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExpandDirection>ou <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExpandDirection>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExpandDirection> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExpandDirection> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.ExpandDirection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you set a size on the Expander control in the direction that the expanded content is displayed, the area that is defined by the size parameter is displayed with a border around it.
trans-unit.target: Quando você definir um tamanho do controle de expansão na direção que o conteúdo expandido é exibido, a área que é definida pelo parâmetro de tamanho é exibida com uma borda ao redor dele.

trans-unit.source: This area displays even when the window is collapsed.
trans-unit.target: Essa área exibe até mesmo quando a janela é recolhida.

trans-unit.source: To set the size of the expanded window, set size dimensions on the content of the Expander control or the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> that encloses the content.
trans-unit.target: Para definir o tamanho da janela expandida, defina dimensões de tamanho do conteúdo do controle expansor ou <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>que inclui o conteúdo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: When an Expander control is the last element in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel>, the Expander is sized to fill the remaining area of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Quando um controle Expander é o último elemento em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel>a expansão é dimensionado para preencher a área restante de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel>

trans-unit.source: To prevent this, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel.LastChildFill%2A> property on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel> to `false`, or make sure that the Expander is not the last element in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Para evitar isso, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel.LastChildFill%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel>para `false`, ou certifique-se de que o expansor não é o último elemento em <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel.LastChildFill%2A>

trans-unit.source: The alignment of Expander content can be defined by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.HorizontalContentAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.VerticalContentAlignment%2A> properties on the control.
trans-unit.target: O alinhamento do conteúdo do expansor pode ser definido, definindo a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.HorizontalContentAlignment%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.VerticalContentAlignment%2A>Propriedades do controle.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.VerticalContentAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.HorizontalContentAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: These properties are applied to the header and to the contents of the expanded window.
trans-unit.target: Essas propriedades são aplicadas para o cabeçalho e o conteúdo da janela expandida.

trans-unit.source: Customizing the Expander Control To apply the same property settings to multiple Expander controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Personalizando o controle expansor para aplicar as mesmas configurações de propriedade para vários controles de expansão, use o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: Você pode modificar o padrão <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>para que o controle uma aparência exclusiva.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como criar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, consulte [Personalizando a aparência de um controle existente, criando um ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the Expander, see [Expander Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para ver as partes e os estados que são específicos para a expansão, consulte [expansor estilos e modelos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de dependência para este controle podem ser definidas pelo estilo padrão do controle.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: Se uma propriedade é definida por um estilo padrão, a propriedade pode ser alterada de seu valor padrão quando o controle é exibido no aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: O estilo padrão é determinado pelo qual tema de área de trabalho é usado quando o aplicativo está em execução.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [padrão WPF temas](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in Expander control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Definir uma propriedade visual só terá efeito se essa propriedade é presente no modelo padrão do controle expansor e é definida usando um.

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: Você pode encontrar uma lista de propriedades visuais na seção "Alterando o Visual estrutura de um controle de" [Personalizando a aparência de um controle existente, criando um ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the content window of an <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander"></xref> control closes and only the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*> is visible.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a janela de conteúdo de um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander"> </xref> controlar fecha e somente o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*>está visível.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*>

trans-unit.source: The Collapsed event occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded%2A> property changes from `true` to `false`.
trans-unit.target: O evento recolhido ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded%2A>propriedade muda de `true` para `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded%2A>

trans-unit.target: # # Roteadas informações de evento | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Estratégia de roteamento | Bolha | | Delegado | |

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander.Collapsed"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander.Collapsed"> </xref> eventos roteados.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the direction in which the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander"></xref> content window opens.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a direção na qual o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander"> </xref> conteúda janela será aberta.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`||

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ExpandDirection"></xref> values that defines which direction the content window opens.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ExpandDirection"> </xref> valores que define a direção que a janela de conteúdo é aberto.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ExpandDirection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ExpandDirection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.ExpandDirection*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.ExpandDirection*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.ExpandDirection*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the content window of an <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander"></xref> control opens to display both its header and content.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a janela de conteúdo de um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander"> </xref> abre para exibir seu cabeçalho e o conteúdo de controle.

trans-unit.source: The Expanded event occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded%2A> property changes from `false` to `true`.
trans-unit.target: O evento expandido ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded%2A>propriedade muda de `false` para `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded%2A>

trans-unit.target: # # Roteadas informações de evento | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Estratégia de roteamento | Bolha | | Delegado | |

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander.Expanded"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander.Expanded"> </xref> eventos roteados.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander"></xref> content window is visible.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define se o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander"> </xref> conteúda janela está visível.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the content window is expanded; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a janela de conteúdo for expandida; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander.Collapsed"></xref> event when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded*> property changes from <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander.Collapsed"> </xref> eventos quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded*>propriedade muda de <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> para <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded*>

trans-unit.source: Creates the implementation of <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Cria a implementação de <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ExpanderAutomationPeer"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ExpanderAutomationPeer"> </xref> para este <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander.Expanded"></xref> event when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded*> property changes from <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander.Expanded"> </xref> eventos quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded*>propriedade muda de <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded*>
